name: Alive (itch) (david-toranzo, Gabriel Ruiz, Edddddurad, Rohan Teredesai, goldie4101)
name_original: Alive (itch) (david-toranzo, Gabriel Ruiz, Edddddurad, Rohan Teredesai, goldie4101)
description:
Far into the future, humanity's last living descendants are their robot creations in the city of Robotnika.

When a virus infects a robot named: SLAVA, a target is painted on his back! 

Join SLAVA as it learns the great secret that the super-computer A.D.A.M. has hidden from Robotnik!

Narrative: Rohan Teredesai 
Art and project manager: Goldie (goldie4101)
Music: Gabriel Ruiz
Sound: Miss Edurad (Edddddurad)
Programmer: David Toranzo (david444456)
